question: I was curious...is it permissable to marry a woman of the Bahai faith if he believes in only One God?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
It is not permissible. A person who believes in the Bahai faith leaves the fold of Islam. (Fatawa Mahmoodiya vol.16 pg.66)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
